General.Name: Zhejiang Jiangshan Chemical Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Communications Technology Co., Ltd. engages in infrastructure engineering business in China. It is involved in the investment, designing, construction, maintenance, and engineering project consulting and management of roads, bridges, tunnels, rail transit, ports and terminals, underground engineering, and other transportation infrastructure services. The company also engages in municipal projects, such as housing construction, water affairs, and lighting; production of prefabricated components; processing, manufacture, and sale of steel structures and traffic safety materials; and traffic engineering construction. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Jiangshan Chemical Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Zhejiang Communications Technology Co., Ltd. in December 2017. Zhejiang Communications Technology Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
